Package transaction

Class TransactionLayer

java.lang.Object
utils.database.BaseLayer
transaction.TransactionLayer
public class TransactionLayer extends BaseLayer
This class represents the layer responsible for managing transactions. It interacts with the database to retrieve and manipulate transaction data.

    • createTransaction

      public int createTransaction(Integer customerId, Integer bikeId, String transactionType)
      Create a new transaction.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer associated with the transaction
      bikeId - The ID of the bike associated with the transaction
      transactionType - The type of the transaction
      Returns:
      The generated ID of the created transaction, or -1 if creation fails
